mapper.select: select id, student_id, grade, speciality, faculty, name, sex, class_name, dept_id, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_apply_form where id = #{id} and del_flag = '0'
select id, student_id, grade, speciality, faculty, name, sex, class_name, dept_id, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time from sys_apply_form where student_id = #{studentId}
mapper.insert: insert into sys_apply_form(student_id, grade, speciality, faculty, name, sex, class_name, dept_id, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values (#{studentId}, #{grade}, #{speciality}, #{faculty}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{className}, #{deptId}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{updateBy}, #{updateTime})

insert into sys_apply_form(student_id, grade, speciality, faculty, name, sex, class_name, dept_id, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.studentId}, #{entity.grade}, #{entity.speciality}, #{entity.faculty}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.className}, #{entity.deptId}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})

insert into sys_apply_form(student_id, grade, speciality, faculty, name, sex, class_name, dept_id, del_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time) values
(#{entity.studentId}, #{entity.grade}, #{entity.speciality}, #{entity.faculty}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.className}, #{entity.deptId}, #{entity.delFlag}, #{entity.createBy}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateBy}, #{entity.updateTime})
on duplicate key update student_id = values(student_id), grade = values(grade), speciality = values(speciality), faculty = values(faculty), name = values(name), sex = values(sex), class_name = values(class_name), dept_id = values(dept_id), del_flag = values(del_flag), create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time)
mapper.update:
update sys_apply_form
student_id = #{studentId},
grade = #{grade},
speciality = #{speciality},
faculty = #{faculty},
name = #{name},
sex = #{sex},
class_name = #{className},
dept_id = #{deptId},
del_flag = #{delFlag},
create_by = #{createBy},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_by = #{updateBy},
update_time = #{updateTime},
where id = #{id}
